amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 112-173 to prevent the distribution of printed legislation to Member offices unless a Member requests the legislation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Paulsen.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Paulsen amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
